title: Matchsafe, ""Souvenir Atlantic City 1902"", ca. 1902
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, curved sides, top, and bottom, featuring raised decoration of sail boat on water, inscribed above "Souvenir" and below "Atlantic City, 1902", all framed by c-scrolls and s-scrolls, incised initials J.G.W. on lid; reverse features incised leaf motif. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, ""Souvenir Atlantic City 1902"", ca. 1902.
ca. 1902. Aluminum. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-846.
